name: No Time To Root
description:
A short game about a man who fell into the fountain of youth. The life and death have since changed their meanings. Gameplay involves platforming and fighting with time aging you... in reverse.  

Useful shortcuts:  

W,A,D - movement 

Shift - attack (only grandpa) 

G - accelerate time 

R - restart from last checkpoint

Shift+R - start from the beginning 

T - show time since restart  

Please don't smoke in real life, you'll age faster.

Director, Game Designer, Graphic Designer, Programmer - carcinizer
Initial Idea, Programming, Design - Wonski
